title: Black cheongsam and matching jacket in leaf motif
content:

  object_work_type: jackets (garments) folk costume

  title_text: Black cheongsam and matching jacket in leaf motif

  preference: main

  shape: irregular

  techniques_name: machine sewing (technique)

  object_colour: black (colour)

  physical_appearance: This is a black cheongsam that is paired with a matching jacket
 also black in colour. The cheongsam has median length sleeves while the jacket is long-sleeved. Tiny leaf images serving as the motif can be seen throughout the cheongsam and its jacket.   A collar is present on the cheongsam as well. There are two buttons located at the front centre of the jacket. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam.

  subject_terms_1: dresses (garments) womenswear plant-derived motifs allover patterns

  subject_terms_2: Motifs Women\u0027s clothing Qipao Ethnic costume Jackets

  subject_terms_3: Ethnic costume Chinese costume

  sgcool_label_text: This is a black silk cheongsam with leaf motif that has a matching jacket. Cheongsams with matching jackets were usually worn at more formal occasions.

Tiny leaf images serving as the motif can be seen throughout the cheongsam and its jacket.   A collar is present on the cheongsam as well. There are two buttons located at the front centre of the jacket. There are no visible tears on the cheongsam.
